page.title: 16Recreation
page.content: Sporting activities and keep fit classes are enjoyed here.Football and Cricket Clubs are supported in Downley and Naphill.The sport enjoyed most by boys is football while girls favour dancing and gymnastics. A very high proportion of children are members of the Scouting & Guiding Association and some parents give up much time to organise their meetings and camps,training to do so. Horticultural Societies flourish in all the villages with shows and visits in the summer and meetings in the winter.Women's Institutes are well attended. Each village holds a fete day in the summer.Local Commons,Hughenden Park and public footpaths for walking are all used by the local population at times.
